entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:13 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 08:51 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
